Package com.knowgate.hipermail

Support Library for WebMail interface

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdHocMailing  
    DBFolder
    A subclass of javax.mail.Folder providing storage for MimeMessages at database LONGVARBINARY columns and MBOX files.
    DBInetAddr
    Internet Address register from k_inet_addrs
    DBMimeMessage
    MIME messages stored at database BLOB columns or MBOX files
    DBMimeMultipart  
    DBMimePart  
    DBStore
    Manages local storage of mail messages at RDBMS and MBOX files
    DraftsHelper
    Helper methods for composing new e-mails
    HeadersHelper
    Set of utility functions for managing MimeMessage headers
    HtmlMimeBodyPart
    Used to perform some maipulations in HTML source code for e-mails
    MailAccount  
    MboxFile
    Provides access to an mbox-formatted file.
    RecipientsHelper
    Helper class for working with recipients lists
    SendMail
    Send a given mail to a recipients list
    SessionHandler
    A wrapper around javax.mail.Store and javax.mail.Transport
    SilentAuthenticator  
    Statistics
